title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar Build 200201151. Search for references to this field5.
OB: When searching for references to the field 'tmpFir' in the external jar using Build 200201151, the search results are not being selected.
EB: The search results should be selected when searching for references to the field 'tmpFir' in the external jar using Build 200201151.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Ensure you have JDK1.3.1 set as the default JRE and have the source for rt.jar.
2. Open java.io.File.
3. Select the field 'tmpFir'.
4. Perform a search for references to this field.
